x.desc: The vertical position of the display object 3D.

y.desc: The horizontal position of the display object 3D.

z.desc: The depth of the display object 3D.

scaleX.desc: The horizontal scaling factor of the display object 3D.

scaleY.desc: The vertical scaling factor of the display object 3D.

scaleZ.desc: The depth scaling factor of the display object 3D.

visible.desc: Whether the display object is visible 3D.

alpha.desc: The alpha value of the display object 3D.

rotationX.desc: The rotation of the display object 3D around the x-axis, in degrees.

rotationY.desc: The rotation of the display object 3D around the y-axis, in degrees.

rotationZ.desc: The rotation of the display object 3D around the s-axis, in degrees.
